event.title: Lightning Talks
event.description:
This month we'll be presenting an evening of lightning talks. If you have been to the ACCU Conference you'll be familiar with the format: a series of short talks from various speakers. The full line-up is:

• Dominic Robinson - A test driven specification with TLA+

• Jon Chesterfield - Waitless

• Dan Towner - H0w error cocrektion gEts yoWr mesXage acro$s

• Rob Desbois - Using range objects for cleaner, safer code

• Thomas Guest - Two timing algorithms

• Chris Simons - Keeping Fit: Improving Refactoring

• Emyr Williams - Unit Tests & Threads, a 10 minute preview

• Ben Hanson - Why is regex considered the pinnacle of text processing?

Each talk will be ten minutes or less. Come along and enjoy a varied, fascinating evening!
